phrases: I felt like such a fool for not noticing until now.
For example, the number of piercings they each had, and the way they talked.
Nana and Ren were so much alike.
It gave me a sense of the deep history they had together.
When I was darkness at that time
With trembling lips
The more I struggle
The more this wound deepens
The broken promise hurt me
Nobody can save me
God, I have only one request
Stop tearing apart my love
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Sorrow tumbling down is your song
All alone with nowhere to go in my life
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Oh baby, help me from frozen pain
With your smile, your eyes, and sing me, just for me
I want to need your love
I am a broken rose
I want to need your love
What is that padlock you are always wearing?
I cannot take it off because I lost the key, he says.
I am wondering, maybe Nana has the key to Ren's padlock.
Ever since I found out that Ren of Trapnest is Nana's ex-boyfriend,
I took out all the music magazines and fan-club notices I had kept
and read them thoroughly, over and over.
I was stunned to realize how I had just been
skimming through the articles until now.
I am clearly the type who only cares to read what I am interested in.
In fact, right now, my mind is full of Nana and Ren,
and I can barely think of anything else.
Although I am also purposely making an effort not to think of anything else.
The other thing is, if I should find a new boyfriend,
I am sure I will stop thinking about Shoji.
It would be nice for such a day to come soon.
Hey, are you ready?
Shall we get going?
Mhm.
Hey... hey, Nana.
Are not you getting changed?
Why?
Are you going to the live concert dressed like that?
It is part of our overnight journey.
The more comfortable the outfit, the better, right?
Say, are not these nice?
Y-Yes, but we have been looking forward to this concert
so should not we dress up a bit?
You are meeting Ren for the first time in two years!
You are the one who is been looking forward to this.
Why should I also hafta dress up?
It is only a Trapnest concert.
First of all, if she wears those sunglasses,
Ren might not recognize her.
Is she doing this on purpose?
Damn, there are a ton of things I want to ask and say to her.
Is this ok?
However, right now my top priority is getting Nana to the concert.
I should be careful not to be too demanding.
Want another sugar for yours?
I will not be using any.
- N-No, I am fine.
- Okay.
The distance between Nana and Ren is getting shorter and shorter.
- I cannot wait to see them.
- Huh?!
Your family.
Especially Natsuko.
I am a big fan of hers.
I am not too comfortable about having you meet them.
My parents are no more than your typical countryside man and woman.
My younger sister still wears that dark makeup...
And my elder sister...
Nana!
She is gained even more weight.
They are identical.
Sorry for making you go through the trouble of picking us up.
Go through the trouble?
Do not mention it.
My workplace is closed today, so I was available.
In this area you cannot get anywhere without a car.
By the way, Nao, could you drive us to the concert?
Sure.
Where is it?
At the Idea Hall.
I want to be there around six.
Then we should leave at around 5:30.
Yes!
Thank you!
I love you, Nao!
Nana, look!
It is my old specialty college!
That brings back memories.
Brings back memories?
But you commuted there until only a year ago, right?
Oh right.
But it seems like ten years ago.
What are you saying?
Art school, right?
Was it fun?
Mhm.
I knew I did not have much talent in that area,
but everyday was so much fun.
With Jun-chan and Kyosuke and...
We hung out together, everyday.
Oh, Nana.
You know, Nami was telling me...
Are you really living with your boyfriend?
It is that guy, right?
The guy who often came by the house while you were in art school...
Shoji.
- No! - I believe you are misunderstanding.
I am Nana's roommate.
Oh?
Really?
You know, why do not you all come and visit us sometime?
If you see, you will understand.
What?
That Nami, going around spreading rumors again.
She is got to be more careful.
I am glad Nana's with me.
This place has too many memories for me to visit alone.
We are back!
Mom!
Nana's here!
Wow, what a grand house!
You are quite the princess.
Not really.
This is normal.
Land is really cheap around here.
- Black! - Did you get me a gift?
A present?
Like a Louis Vuitton bag?
Tokyo is not a foreign country, you know!
Hey!
Nami, behave yourself in front of our guest.
Hello, I am Nana's mother.
You may find it hard to relax here, but please make yourself at home.
Pleased to meet you.
I am Nana Osaki.
Thank you for the hospitality.
Nana?
That is right.
We have the same name.
But Nana's name is written in katakana characters.
Is not she totally pretty?
It is amazing how different two people with the same name can be.
Mom!
She is such an annoying girl!
Way to go, Natsuko!
You are laughing too much, Nami!
Nami, I found out you are talking nonsense again.
Apparently Nana lives with Nana.
- What? - What?
Why?
What about your boyfriend?
Again, you are misunderstanding!
You serious?
That is so boring!
Then why did not you tell us in the first place?
You are a source of constant worry.
I told you
- but you would not listen, mom. -
So you are living with my daughter.
I can only imagine how much trouble she is causing.
I am really sorry.
No, Nana is honest, cheerful and kind.
Living with her gives me encouragement.
As I imagined,
I can see she is been brought up in a very warm family environment.
You certainly know the right things to say.
Ouch!
You still have some time, right?
- Why do not I make some tea?
- Nana...
Oh, I have some Japanese sweets.
Nana, you are such a good actress.
Huh?
Nana is honest, cheerful and kind?
I really believe that.
By the way, where is your dad?
Does he work Saturdays too?
Ah, yeah.
He will be back in the evening.
Then I will be able to meet him.
I am looking forward to it.
He is not a father worth getting your hopes up for.
Or rather, I am really sorry.
My family can be so noisy.
I am embarrassed.
No, I am really enjoying it.
Natsuko's even better than I imagined.
Meeting her was such a thrill.
What is so great about her?
She is just a normal lady.
No, that is a quality you do not see much.
She is the ideal mother.
Really?
Then what about your mom, Nana?
What kind of person is she?
I bet she is pretty and cool.
I wonder.
I can barely remember.
What do you mean?
You have only been away from your hometown for less than half a year.
No, I have not seen her since I was four.
Huh?
Why not?
She ran off with a guy.
She could even be dead now.
Not that I care.
Then, Nana, it was just you and your father?
Do you have any siblings?
No.
Actually I never had a father to start with.
I was raised by my mother's mother.
But grandma died when I was 15.
That is why I find this so attractive.
The atmosphere of belonging to a loving family like yours.
Since I never had one, this is fun.
Attractive?
But Nana...
To me, this is normal.
Sorry, here I am talking about a gloomy subject.
I was just a bit surprised.
I am sorry for asking all these questions without really giving it much thought.
But I am glad.
Oh, no, that came out wrong!
Sorry.
I am not glad about what you explained!
That part shocked me!
Calm down.
Nana.
You have never talked to me about yourself until now,
so I would wonder why that is.
It would make me sad thinking about it.
So I am glad you shared that with me.
I see.
Sorry.
It never occurred to me that you might be feeling like that.
I never had a close female friend until now,
so I do not know how to spend time together.
I am not good at talking about myself.
So I end up not talking about things.
But just ask me, and I will tell you anything you want, okay?
So stop feeling sad.
What is so funny?
Because Nana, why are you always like that cool guy?
You are more like a boyfriend to me than a female friend.
You just took my breath away right now.
No, I cannot have you feel that way about me.
You will really tell me anything I want, right?
Yeah.
And promise to be frank with me.
Yeah.
Do you still love Ren?
You knew.
I am sorry.
Acting as if I did not know.
But...
You brought me here knowing, right?
Thank you.
Nana.
Nana, I want to buy a pamphlet and stuff.
What about you?
I will have a smoke and then go to my seat.
Show me your pamphlet later.
Do you still love Ren?
Nana ended up not answering that question.
However, I could tell even without her telling me.
The word love...
If you were able to say that word with ease,
you would have already gone to see him long ago.
We are smack in front of the guitarist.
You have the best seat in the house, Nana!
The stage is much closer to the seats than I expected.
What will I do?
I am already on the verge of crying.
Though there is no reason for me to cry.
But rather than choose happiness as a woman,
she chose to protect her pride.
Nana.
Ladies and gentlemen, the event is about to begin.
If you are yet to be seated,
please promptly make your way to your seats.
Now that we have our band members, all we need is a band name.
What will it be?
Why do not we keep the band name we had before?
There is nothing wrong with Brute.
That is so lame.
Sounds too barbaric.
You are the one who came up with the name.
Yes, but I want to start fresh.
We finally have a pretty girl on vocals,
so we cannot have anything barbaric, can we?
Right.
Then what about Olive?
Popeye's girl.
Does Olive match your image?
I think not.
Same goes for you.
And me.
Nana, stop laughing and help us think.
Anything you come up with is fine with me.
Hey, are you serious about being the vocalist of the band?
Anything is fine with me.
Can you say you are enjoying life,
the way you take on everything with that slanted attitude?
I never said Anything is fine with me.
Then give it some thought.
Give some input into the band.
This coming from the most self-centered member of the band.
What about this?
This is nice.
Black Stone.
Do not just pick the first thing you see.
But it is cool.
I have never seen anything like it.
Are those any good?
They have a strong scent.
Yeah, they are good.
They are actually cigars.
I made a trade with a tobacco shop owner for them.
- A trade?! - A trade?!
Yuck!
What is this?
Such a weird taste!
Really?
But not bad.
Black Stone. BLAST for short.
That is easy to say.
Yeah, that is nice.
BLAST.
He took my cigarette.
- Yuck! - What the!
You know, BLAST also means a strong gust of wind.
Really?
That is great!
That is kind of cool that we shorten the name
and it also means something!
Should we go with that then?
We are a band of four, so let us go with Black Stones.
It is an odd name, but we are an odd band so it kind of fits.
Agreed!
Hurray for BLAST!
Okay, it is decided.
So, leader, how about a celebration speech?
They really went with it.
Well then, band members, an order from your leader.
From this day on, we will all smoke this brand of cigarettes.
- Smoke it yourself! - Smoke it yourself!
Why... am I crying?
But my heart's filled with emotion.
Nana...
That night, I had repeatedly prayed so hard that the destiny waiting
for Nana after this would be that of happiness.
That time, I wanted to continue holding that hand
that I unknowingly was holding.
Always, forever.
I reached into the sky
But I could not reach what I wanted
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
Like colorful balloons
I am alone
My hand had no place to go
And gently you took it
Starless night
I will not look back at the shadow of my past
I want to feel your warmth
Tears are falling down
Even if I am unsure I will not let go
Of your hand holding mine
